name: Channel Auto Post
description: Channel Auto Post Bot for telegram, by @BotzHub.

FROM_CHANNEL1.description: The ID of the main channel from where posts have to be copied.

TO_CHANNEL1.description: The ID of the channel to which the posts are to be sent.

TO_CHANNEL2.description: The ID of the channel to which the posts are to be sent.

BACKUP_CHANNEL1.description: The ID of the main channel from where posts have to be copied.

BACKUP_CHANNEL2.description: The ID of the channel to which the posts are to be sent.
